base_description: White rectangular cabinet with three drawers.
part_description: Three equally sized drawers with handles, vertically aligned. Each drawer is rectangular, fitting within the cabinet's frame. The cabinet is solid and box-shaped.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out of the cabinet on tracks, allowing for smooth operation. The drawers are stacked vertically, with each one resting above the next. Handles on the drawers facilitate easy opening and closing.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a countertop. It interacts with users by providing storage space, accessible through the drawer handles. The flat top can support additional objects or serve as a workspace.
